divs: sighting detailsat appx 12:15 while letting my dog in from doing her business, on a completely clear night with a full moon and the postlights on in my back yard, i noticed a very bright light behind tghe trees in the distance to the west. this was much brighter thatn any stars or planes and seemed out of place. i ran upstairs to wake my husband and look out the second story window. gthere were a formation that appeared to look like a radio towers...except that the lights were brights white...and there are no towers located there! there were 3 stacked on the right, 2 stacked to their left and one to the left of those two. i ran to get my husband and by the time i got back (oine min) they were all separate anjd seemed to be drifting like dandelionjs in the wind. they were not moving lkike planes, of which there were several in the sky and these flew higher, had distinctive lights flashing and flew wquickly in a sgtraight line. these "objects" did not look like this at all, hey seemed to drift some going left and then back to the right again. they stayed close to the horizon except when i first saw them "stacked". with binoculars, my husband thought he may have seen red and blue lights on them??? they were really too far for me to say with the naked eye. the one i saw later was just a very bright white light. could tghis be helicopters?? or something else? did anyone else see this in bergen county, nj...near montvale\ old tappan\ park ridge? scared the crap out of me!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Old Tappan
This sighting has never been favorited.
